kharifDescription: Monsoon crops sown at the beginning of the rains (June-July). Major crops include Rice, Maize, and Cotton. They require warm, wet weather.
rabiDescription: Winter crops sown in October-December. They require cool weather for growth. Major crops include Wheat, Barley, and Mustard.
zaidDescription: Summer crops grown between Rabi and Kharif seasons (March-June). These are short-duration crops like Watermelon, Cucumber, and leafy vegetables.
fruitIrrigationDescription: Drip irrigation is highly efficient for fruit orchards, delivering water directly to the root zone. This conserves water and minimizes weed growth.
fetchingMarketPrices: Fetching your location to get local market prices...
aiWelcome: Hello! How can I help you with your farming questions today?
typeYourQuestion: Type your question or use the mic...
deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone.
